inclusion.criterion: first ischemic or hemorrhagic stroke causing right or left hemiplegia or hemiparesis
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: enrolling in the trial within four weeks from the stroke
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: cognitive deficits that could prevent patients from understanding the therapist instructions
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: an additional neurological or orthopedic disease known to cause a motor impairment for itself
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

notes: The patient has Wilson disease, which is confirmed by high liver copper concentration. He has tremors and jaundice, but no significant cognitive decline or visual impairment.
